text: @realDonaldTrump @FoxNews Yeah, well, people came out of your amazing rally with the Coronavirus so why don’t you talk about that instead of pointless ratings. You have this obsession with ratings that no one else cares about, even your own party is tired of it. This is not The Apprentice.
